segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of a message and to transmit identifying number and type of the message.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate a date and time applying to the whole message, e.g., date and time of document issue.

segment.name: Transport service requirements
segment.documentation: TSR, A segment to identify the contract, conditions of carriage, services, and priority requirements for the transport.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment to indicate default currencies and exchange rates.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to indicate a monetary value for entire consignment, e.g. insured value, invoice amount, disbursements, etc.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free form or processable supplementary information, such as status of transport, remarks to be printed on the transport documents (where required), consignment remarks, insurance instructions, etc., or any other additional information.

segment.name: Control total
segment.documentation: CNT, A segment to specify totals for a consignment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 1: A group of segments to specify locations and related date(s)/time(s) which apply to the entire message, e.g. place of transshipment.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to identify a location applying to the entire message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date(s) and time(s) relating to the location.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 2: A group of segments to specify terms of delivery and related locations.

segment.name: Terms of delivery
segment.documentation: TOD, A segment to specify the applicable terms of delivery.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to specify a location related to the terms of delivery.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 3: A group of segments containing a reference and constants which apply to the entire message.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to express a reference which applies to the entire message such as: the document/message number that is to be updated by this very message (according to data element 1225 Message Function, Coded in segment BGM), booking reference, order number, insurance contract, etc.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time relating to the reference.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 4: A group of segments to identify customs and other governmental procedures and required documents.

segment.name: Governmental requirements
segment.documentation: GOR, A segment to indicate applicable governmental procedures related to import, export and transport of the goods.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to provide supplementary governmental requirements information.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 5: A group of segments to specify required documents by government.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment to indicate a document required by government.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to specify the date/time related to the required document.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 6: A group of segments to indicate charge methodology which applies to the entire message.

segment.name: Charge payment instructions
segment.documentation: CPI, A segment to indicate default charge methodology.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment to specify the payment currency related to the charge methodology.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to identify the place of charge collection.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to identify the monetary amount associated with the charges.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 7: A group of segments to specify charge calculations associated with the transport.

segment.name: Transport charge/rate calculations
segment.documentation: TCC, A segment to specify charge.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate a location.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify processable supplementary information associated with charge.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment to specify currencies associated with charge.

segment.name: Price details
segment.documentation: PRI, A segment to specify price details such as price (e.g. 100 dollar) and unit price basis (e.g. per 1000 kilogram).

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of units to which the unit price basis applies.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, A segment to indicate the applicable reduction or surcharge percentage details.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to specify a monetary amount, such as prepaid amount, discount or total amount.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, A segment to indicate a quantity, for example actual weight, declared weight or chargeable weight.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 8: A group of segments to indicate details of the movement of goods such as mode and means of transport, locations, departure, and arrival date(s) and time(s).

segment.name: Details of transport
segment.documentation: TDT, A segment to indicate information related to a certain stage of the transport, such as mode, means and carrier.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate departure/arrival date and time.

segment.name: Transport service requirements
segment.documentation: TSR, A segment to identify contract, conditions of carriage, services, priority requirements for this stage of transport.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate a location such as origin, destination, stop off, etc. related to this leg of transport.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 9: A group of segments to specify an additional reference related to the stage of the transport.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to specify the additional reference.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to identify date and time relating to the reference.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 10: A group of segments to identify a party, related references, locations contacts, required documents, and charges to be paid by the party.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the party's name, address, and function.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate location where a specific function will be performed.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to identify the monetary amount associated with the party.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 11: A group of segments identifying a contact and its communications related to the party.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department within a party.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 12: A group of segments to identify required documents.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment to identify a document required of, by or for the party.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to identify date and time relating to the reference.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 13: A group of segments to specify charges associated with the party.

segment.name: Transport charge/rate calculations
segment.documentation: TCC, A segment to specify charges associated with the party.

segment.name: Price details
segment.documentation: PRI, A segment to specify price details such as price (e.g. 100 dollar) and unit price basis (e.g. per 1000 kilogram).

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of units to which the unit price basis applies.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, A segment to indicate the applicable reduction or surcharge percentage details.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to specify a monetary amount, such as prepaid amount, discount or total amount.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, A segment to indicate a quantity, for example actual weight, declared weight or chargeable weight.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 14: A group of segments to specify a reference related to the party.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to identify a reference used by a party.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time relating to the reference.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 15: A group of segments to identify the charge and its amount to be paid by the party.

segment.name: Charge payment instructions
segment.documentation: CPI, A segment to identify default charge methodology.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment to indicate payment currency related to the charge methodology.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to identify the place of charge collection.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to identify the monetary amount associated with the charges.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 16: A group of segments to describe the goods items for which transport is undertaken.

segment.name: Goods item details
segment.documentation: GID, A segment to identify a goods item for which transport is undertaken. A goods item can be identified by up to three levels of packaging.

segment.name: Handling instructions
segment.documentation: HAN, A segment to specify handling instructions relating to the goods item.

segment.name: Temperature
segment.documentation: TMP, A segment to specify a temperature setting for a goods item.

segment.name: Range details
segment.documentation: RNG, A segment to specify a temperature range setting for a goods item.

segment.name: Transport movement details
segment.documentation: TMD, A segment to specify transport movement details for a goods item.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to specify a country associated with a goods item, such as country of origin, or country of destination.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to specify a monetary amount associated with a goods item, such as declared value, FOB value, etc.

segment.name: Additional product id
segment.documentation: PIA, A segment to specify article numbers.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify processable supplementary information relating to the goods item.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 17: A group of segments to identify different places of collection and/or delivery for the goods item.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to specify an address of a place of collection or delivery for a goods item.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time relating to the place of collection or delivery.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 18: A group of segments to describe the goods item.

segment.name: Nature of cargo
segment.documentation: GDS, A segment to describe the nature of cargo.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to describe the goods item.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 19: A group of segments to specify measurements applicable to a goods item.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements, other than dimensions, applicable to a goods item.

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units to each of which the given measurement applies.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 20: A group of segments to specify dimensions applicable to a goods item.

segment.name: Dimensions
segment.documentation: DIM, To specify dimensions applicable to a goods item.

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units to each of which the given dimension applies.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 21: A group of segments to identify references to a goods item.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to identify a reference to a goods item.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time relating to the reference.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 22: A group of segments to specify marks and numbers of a goods item.

segment.name: Package identification
segment.documentation: PCI, A segment to specify marks and numbers of a good item.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to identify a reference relating to the marks and numbers.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to identify date and time of the reference.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 23: A group of segments to specify documents and associated date(s) and time(s) for a goods item.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment to specify a document prepared for a goods item.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to associate date and time with the prepared document.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 24: A group of segments to identify transport details and associated measurements for a goods item. This group may be repeated to indicate the different phases of the movement.

segment.name: Transport placement
segment.documentation: TPL, A segment to identify transport details for a goods item.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 25: A group of segments to identify measurements.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to specify the distribution of a goods item among the transport details.

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units to each of which the given measurement applies.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 26: A group of segments to specify the distribution of a goods item among the transport equipment.

segment.name: Split goods placement
segment.documentation: SGP, A segment to identify the equipment in which goods are transported.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 27: A group of segments to identify measurements.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements of that portion of the goods item in the equipment.

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units to each of which the given measurement applies.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 28: A group of segments to specify charge associated with the goods item.

segment.name: Transport charge/rate calculations
segment.documentation: TCC, A segment to specify charge associated with the goods item.

segment.name: Price details
segment.documentation: PRI, A segment to specify price details such as price (e.g. 100 dollar) and unit price basis (e.g. per 1000 kilogram).

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of units to which the unit price basis applies.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, A segment to indicate the applicable reduction or surcharge percentage details.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to specify a monetary amount, such as prepaid amount, discount or total amount.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, A segment to indicate a quantity, for example actual weight, declared weight or chargeable weight.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate location where a specific function will be performed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 29: A group of segments to specify dangerous goods details related to the goods item. One goods item may be in different dangerous goods classes.

segment.name: Dangerous goods
segment.documentation: DGS, A segment to indicate the class of dangerous goods, packing group, etc.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify the dangerous goods technical name and to specify any additional dangerous goods information.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 30: A group of segments to identify a contact to whom communication regarding the dangerous goods can be directed.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 31: A group of segments to identify dangerous goods measurements.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements of the dangerous goods.

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units to each of which the given measurement applies.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 32: A group of segments to specify the distribution of the dangerous goods among the transport equipment.

segment.name: Split goods placement
segment.documentation: SGP, A segment to identify the equipment in which the dangerous goods are transported.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 33: A group of segments to identify dangerous goods measurements.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements of that portion of the dangerous goods in the equipment.

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units to each of which the given measurement applies.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 34: A group of segments to specify equipment in which goods are transported.

segment.name: Equipment details
segment.documentation: EQD, A segment to specify equipment, and equipment size and type used in the transport.

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify number of pieces of equipment required.

segment.name: Transport movement details
segment.documentation: TMD, A segment to specify transport movement details for the equipment.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements, other than dimensions, associated with the equipment, such as weight.

segment.name: Dimensions
segment.documentation: DIM, A segment to specify dimensions applicable to equipment.

segment.name: Seal number
segment.documentation: SEL, A segment to identify seal and seal issuer associated with the equipment.

segment.name: Transport placement
segment.documentation: TPL, A segment to identify transport details for the equipment.

segment.name: Handling instructions
segment.documentation: HAN, A segment to specify handling instructions for specified equipment.

segment.name: Temperature
segment.documentation: TMP, A segment to indicate a temperature setting for the equipment.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify processable supplementary information associated with the equipment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 35: A group of segments to specify charges associated with the equipment.

segment.name: Transport charge/rate calculations
segment.documentation: TCC, A segment to specify a charge associated with the equipment.

segment.name: Price details
segment.documentation: PRI, A segment to specify price details such as price (e.g. 100 dollar) and unit price basis (e.g. per 1000 kilogram).

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of units to which the unit price basis applies.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, A segment to indicate the applicable reduction or surcharge percentage details.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to specify a monetary amount, such as prepaid amount, discount or total amount.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, A segment to indicate a quantity, for example actual weight, declared weight or chargeable weight.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 36: A group of segments to identify different equipment pick-up or drop-off places.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to specify a pick-up or drop-off address.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time relating to pick-up or drop-off.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment Group 37: A group of segments to specify the attached equipment and related number of pieces.

segment.name: Attached equipment
segment.documentation: EQA, A segment to identify attached or related equipment such as a chassis attached to a container.

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify number of pieces of equipment required.
